nodes.text: The Royal Hut, or chieftain's hut, was the home of the Ewok chief and his family in the Bright Tree Village on the Forest Moon of Endor.

Chief Chirpa occupied the chieftain's hut of Bright Tree Village in 4 ABY. It was here that C-3PO told the Ewok village elders the story of the Rebel Alliance's struggle against the Galactic Empire and where the elders made the strike team a part of the tribe.
